message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product, and I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire it at a fair price. My initial offer is $12,000.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I'm willing to make an offer of $8,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I'd love to hear if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I understand that you're looking to make a deal, but I'm not willing to go as low as $8,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $10,500.
I understand that you need to make a profit, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you at $9,500. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm not willing to accept $9,500. I'm willing to make a slight concession, but I need to stay above my minimum. My counteroffer is $10,000, and I'm willing to meet you at this price. If not, I'll have to explore other options.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $10,000, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,000, and that's my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal.

I'm surprised you're willing to go as low as $9,000, Bob. I think I can meet you at a price that's a bit higher than that, but not much. My counteroffer is $9,800, and I'm willing to consider it a final offer from me. If not, I'll have to move on.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $9,800, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,200, and that's my final offer. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'd be happy to make a deal.

I'm starting to think we're not going to meet in the middle, Bob. I'm willing to make one last concession, but I need to make a profit. My counteroffer is $9,500, and that's as low as I'm willing to go. If not, I'll have to explore other options.
I'm willing to meet you at $9,000, Alice. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to explore other options.
